Class SpriteLineNode

Namespace
Fantas
Assembly
Fantas.dll

Create a line as a SpriteNode Drawing a Line using a Sprite can be better for performance reasons since Sprite drawing can be batched.

public class SpriteLineNode : SpriteNode
